what_you_do: Patty Hedrick is a registered nurse and aging life care professional who helps people transform their lives through her Embrace Method.
who_you_serve: Patty serves individuals looking to embrace aging and transform their lives.
social_proof: Patty has received several accolades for her work, including being featured in the Presidential Who's Who and awarded Woman of the Year by the National Association of Professional Women (NAPW). She is also a bestselling author, speaker, and coach.
business_focus: Patty Hedrick helps individuals transform their lives through her Embrace Method.
service_provided: coaching, consulting, life care planning, legal nurse consulting, defense medical exams
